features.subject: Document User Access
features.description: Users can now assign all the allowed users to the document. Default assigned users are owner and tenant admin.

features.subject: Tenant Settings
features.description: Users can now configure the app settings.

features.subject: Tenant UI Customization
features.description: Users can now configure the app's user interface.

features.subject: Role Management
features.description: Users can now manage the roles and attach permissions.

features.subject: Custom Report
features.description: Users can now view, search, and print the report.

features.subject: Document Management
features.description: Users can now search, view, add, edit, delete, and download a documents.

features.subject: User Management
features.description: Admin users can now search, view, add, edit, and delete a user.

features.subject: Forgot/Reset Password
features.description: Users may able to reset his/her password.

features.subject: User Defined Field (UDF) Management
features.description: Admin users can now search, view, add, edit, and delete user defined field metadata.
